definition: flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: Consider a family of parallel lines that cut the conic .
sentences.chinese: 设有一组平行线与圆锥曲线相交。

sentences.english: But we, are two parallel lines, can only look, but can not intersect.
sentences.chinese: 而我们，注定是两条平行线，只能相望，却不能相交。

sentences.english: Draw one pair of parallel lines first, followed by the others to complete the shapes.
sentences.chinese: 首先画两条平行线，然后再画出其他的完成图形。

sentences.english: He ruled the paper with a ruler.
sentences.chinese: 他用尺在纸上画上平行线。

sentences.english: An affine transformation is one in which parallel lines remain parallel after the transformation.
sentences.chinese: 仿射转换指的是平行线在转换后还保持平行。

sentences.english: He proved the existence of parallel lines .
sentences.chinese: 他证明了平行线的存在性。

sentences.english: We would like two parallel lines, very near and far, no point of intersection.
sentences.chinese: 我们就像两条平行线一样，很近又很远，没有交点。

sentences.english: Parallel lines are, by definition, lines on the same plane that never join.
sentences.chinese: 按照定义，平行线是在同一平面上永不相交的线。

definition: broken line (continuous figure made up of straight line segments)/polygonal line/dog leg
